meanings.sent1: The iguanian scales on the iguana were shiny and green.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper studied the iguanian behavior of the iguanas in the exhibit.
meanings.sent3: The iguanian iguana decided to wear a tiny hat for a fancy iguana party.
meanings.sent4: Her love for iguanas was so strong, it felt almost iguanian in nature.
meanings.sent5: The iguanian markings on the iguana's skin made it stand out from the other lizards.

meanings.definition: A member of the lizard family Iguanidae.
meanings.sent1: The iguanian basked in the sun on the rock, soaking up the warmth.
meanings.sent2: I spotted an iguanian scurrying across the desert sand.
meanings.sent3: The iguanian lizard challenged the gecko to a dance-off.
meanings.sent4: In the world of lizards, the iguanian is like the king of the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The iguanian's long tail helped it balance on the tree branches with ease.
